This fix (2018/07/30) is based on code base of V 11.75,
which improves speed of building Cross References (Ctr+R) 
by addinig additional buffering.

It should work with V 11.64 ... 11.75.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
To apply the fix just unpack 
http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1175/fix/makeref-fix180730.zip
in BaKoMa TeX folder. 

Check that the file
"BaKoMa\Dialog\wxPS\Modal Dialogs\Makeref-AD.wxps
have been replaced. 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

NOTE: This fix will be included into following versions.
